title: Jonyshake71
author: Jonyshake71
content: Because of bear market, i don't connect myself much with crypto world like before cause everywhere altcoins are dumping although sometimes we see little pump. I hope bull will be coming soon and thats why preparation for it from now. I already have btc eth ada xrp and others top coins.Now i just want to know some underated altcoins names that have potentiality to perform good like 5x to 6x in next bull run. Have you invested such altcoins or do you know such altcoins? You can suggest me, I'll analysis about those

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: You have selected good already but you can add Dot to it. There are other ones but which are more volatile. The one I know are Aptos, Sand, Gala, Quantum, Ethereum classic, Dash, Solana. There are many but which I will not continue to mention.If bitcoin fall in price, these altcoins fall many times more. Know that.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Stay away from currencies that have unlimited supply or have reached ATH in previous times and you were not even able to reach 50% of this price now, as all of them indicate a dead currency that will not rise in the future.When you invest, always make sure of the quantity offered and whether there is growth in demand or not. Sometimes the price is a direct reflection of these variables, but often these currencies manipulate the market capacity, and the price through the quantity offered, so be careful.xrp, Ethereum classic, Solana are examples of coins you should avoid investing in.You can invest in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dash and this is not investment advice.

comments.author: JahriMeayer
comments.body: btc eth ada xrp and others top altcoins you hold, its already enough for investment. I think those will give you heavy benefit while next bull run come even those altcoins have ability to give you 5-6x of your investment. Underated altcoins are always higher risky than others top altcoins. Thats why few people talk about those. For me, sandbox and aptos sounds wise to invest for long, DYOR

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Jonyshake71 on July 29, 2023, 07:36:39 AMNow i just want to know some underated altcoins names that have potentiality to perform good like 5x to 6x in next bull run. Have you invested such altcoins or do you know such altcoins? You can suggest me, I'll analysis about thoseHashflow (HFT) and Oasis Network (ROSE), you can research those 2 projects first, I think these two projects have a future because of their utility, especially for $ROSE which has a fairly strong ecosystem.Note: I'm not suggesting you buy those two tokens, I'm just giving my little view on a good project that you should analyze.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: Jonyshake71 on July 29, 2023, 07:36:39 AMNow i just want to know some underated altcoins names that have potentiality to perform good like 5x to 6x in next bull run. Have you invested such altcoins or do you know such altcoins? You can suggest me, I'll analysis about thoseWould you gamble with obscure altcoins? If you already own BTC, ETH and XRP why not continue to grow your existing portfolio, isn't that better than owning risky ones?I know it's your decision, but I don't want to fall for obscure altcoins but think about the PEPE meme, there is a lot of speculation out there that PEPE will break ATH again in the next cycle, but I don't really believe it because it's too risky for me to avoid it, unless BTC and ETH will continue to be added to the portfolio.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Jonyshake71 on July 29, 2023, 07:36:39 AMBecause of bear market, i don't connect myself much with crypto world like before cause everywhere altcoins are dumping although sometimes we see little pump. I hope bull will be coming soon and thats why preparation for it from now. I already have btc eth ada xrp and others top coins.Now i just want to know some underated altcoins names that have potentiality to perform good like 5x to 6x in next bull run. Have you invested such altcoins or do you know such altcoins? You can suggest me, I'll analysis about thoseI do not want to be frustrated, but it is difficult to know if the currency will rise by 5x to 6x. In short, the market has not changed, but the only variable is Bitcoin, and all alternative currencies change their price according to the change in the price of Bitcoin. Therefore, instead of striving and investing in alternative currencies, I worked hard to invest in Bitcoin, which inevitably It will be 3x to 6x the current price, which is about $30,000.Ethereum would be a good investment.Consider the following measures: - Market capacity is a misleading criterion. - New memecoins are a scam. - NFT & DeFi is an old trend.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: $crypto$ on July 29, 2023, 02:04:18 PMWould you gamble with obscure altcoins? If you already own BTC, ETH and XRP why not continue to grow your existing portfolio, isn't that better than owning risky ones?Maybe he just wants to increase the level of portfolio diversification. If I were him, I would definitely look for other tokens that can give me profit apart from my current portfolio. Also keep in mind, the level of risk is in line with the level of profit that can be obtained, OP is looking for an underrate altcoin of course because he wants to get maximum profit even though the risk is also quite high.

comments.author: tsaroz
comments.body: There are already some good coins mentioned, I'm not going to repeat them. IMO, one category that would shine on a bull run would be the utility tokens. As there would be thousands of new tokens being issued everyday, people got to have some coins for gas. Namely, Ethereum, BNB, matic, Solana, torn, cardano, avalanche, steem, algorand and likes. Another sector that could rise again would be the dapps as people would be doing more transactions, that would increase the price of uniswap, bsw, 1inch, pancakeswap and likewise tokens. So, these two sectors are my high priority.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Do the selection of coins yourself, do not rely on someone who will bring you ready-made information about good investments on a platter. This is utopian reasoning of almost every crypto beginner. If you yourself can't understand what you need to invest in, then you also can't understand when it's right to lock in your profits from those coins you may be advised. Study the market, then start investing. Not the other way around.

comments.author: I_RodimusPrime
comments.body: Here is some of my top 5 coins for next bull run. So don't forget to give some space in your bucket to these alts also. ARB - Limited supply and use caseOP - Ecosystem BNB - Finance BackgroundZRO - (Layerzero) | Still not yet releasedZRA - (Zksynce) | Still not yet released

comments.author: khiholangkang
comments.body: Today I hold several coins other than bitcoin including ETH, XRP, and Matic, I think these coins have enough potential to be able to provide benefits in the bullrun later, moreover today's XRP has no problems binding them to develop, surely XRP will more broadly in the future of its utility.Matic itself I noticed that there was a proposal that the developer was considering and changed the name of their coin which was originally Matic to POL and a few more updates in the update ecosystem with some integration on their network.Maybe if you are interested you can go directly to the page that owns these projects.And yes, I almost forgot, that I also hold CRP, because I think this also has enough potential as a project with confidential identity. DYORI agree with what Xal0leX said, it's better to choose a coin according to your own choice because you yourself will receive the consequences, so investment decisions are your obligation to determine where you want to invest.

comments.author: juniperion
comments.body: I have been watching Bytedex since 2021. When I invested some money on Bext, there was just a whitepaper. But now, there are lots of products on Bytedex Ecosystem. For this reson, I believe Bext has great potential. People don't still know Bytedex. And, Bext is so cheap. I appreciated it's vision. Some information is here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5425040.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5424978.0

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: To me this is not a good financial advise because you are at the risk of lose your asset anything is possible here and if you lose your hand earn money for shitcoin then you have no one to be blamed for the nasty act.But however if you must investment in any altcoin why not look Rangers protocols RPG, Unitedcrowd UCT I just listed here as I have no assurance about the project and please do not hold me for any lost at the cost of making your choice to invest in it.

comments.author: JunkieMiner
comments.body: Having a good collection, also you can add more coins. But it also depends on your portfolio. As I have seen your selected coins, it means that you have a decent portfolio. And as I can say dot can be better for you to add it to your portfolio for a long term. Your portfolio would be better.

comments.author: fmz89
comments.body: first you must seeing that project still alive and active and fully circulated or atleast almost. lot of project ready to drop some big update to gain hype when the times is right i meant when btc on top  , web3 gain lot of traction this day, i would say lisk quite undervalue this time around

Do it all.This is not a piece of financial advice, I recommend that you do your own research based on the criteria you set up, so invest wisely and DYOR.https://getgraphene.io/
